description: Generates an SQL query from a natural language query. For more information, see Generate a query for structured data in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: queryGenerationInput
parameters.description: Specifies information about a natural language query to transform into SQL. The text of the query. The type of the query.

parameters.name: transformationConfiguration
parameters.description: Specifies configurations for transforming the natural language query into SQL. The mode of the transformation. textToSqlConfiguration (dict) --- Specifies configurations for transforming text to SQL. knowledgeBaseConfiguration (dict) --- Specifies configurations for a knowledge base to use in transformation. The ARN of the knowledge base The type of resource to use in transformation.

nested_params.name: textToSqlConfiguration
nested_params.description: Specifies configurations for transforming text to SQL.

nested_params.name: knowledgeBaseConfiguration
nested_params.description: Specifies configurations for a knowledge base to use in transformation.

nested_params.name: knowledgeBaseArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the knowledge base.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of resource to use in transformation.

nested_items.name: queries
nested_items.description: A list of objects, each of which defines a generated query that can correspond to the natural language queries.

nested_items.name: sql
nested_items.description: An SQL query that corresponds to the natural language query.
